adjectives.description: atomistic (comparative more atomistic, superlative most atomistic)

entries.meaning: Of or pertaining to atoms or to atomism.
examples: It is the object of the mechanical atomistic philosophy to confound synthesis with synartesis, or rather with mere juxtaposition of corpuscles separated by invisible interspaces.

entries.meaning: Divided into separate elements; not holistic.
(economics) Of a market: divided such that no single actor can noticeably affect market-wide values such as the price; competitive.
